elss-rajnikanth.title: ELSS Rajnikanth
elss-rajnikanth.subTitle: Stills & Gifs
elss-rajnikanth.description: This project was done as a part of a concept animation for HDFC while working at Enparadigm. The aim was to show in a fun way about how investing in ELSS can help solve financial problems easily and provide dual benefits of money and tax savings.

xmas-21.title: Xmas21
xmas-21.subTitle: Stills & Gifs
xmas-21.description: A short film to celebrate christmas while working from home. The intention was to remember the joy and warmth of coming together and celebrating christmas, and to try to remind everyone that we can still share that joy by participating together with online celebrations also.

level-up.title: Level Up
level-up.description: A concept animation for HDFC while working at Enparadigm. It aims to show how easy it is to level up your life with HDFC mutual funds.

pandemic.title: Pandemic
pandemic.subTitle: GIFs
pandemic.description: A concept animation for HDFC while working at Enparadigm. During the uncertain time of Covid 19, the aim of the video was to convey how mutual funds can help in such uncertain times and provides financial stability.

cricket-sip.title: Cricket SIP
cricket-sip.subTitle: Stills
cricket-sip.description: A concept animation for HDFC while working at Enparadigm. It was a part of a short video series for instagram that aims to show how investing in SIP can help with beating inflation.

i-orders.title: iOrders
i-orders.subTitle: Stills
i-orders.description: A freelance project for a client. The aim of the video is to introduce what is iOrders and how it can be used.

the-priest-and-the-goat.title: The Priest and the goat
the-priest-and-the-goat.subTitle: Stills
the-priest-and-the-goat.description: Animation for HDFC while working at Enparadigm. It was a part of a learning video series for youtube in which different folk stories and fables were used to inform and understand about basic investing problems and how to go about them in your life.

block-puzzle.title: Block Puzzle
block-puzzle.subTitle: Stills
block-puzzle.description: An unfinished freelance project done with Weave Media. The aim of the video was to highlight the game features and its exciting winning prizes.
